ai-patthana19.16:0.2_0: under the investigation of the Dhamma: One whatever is suitable for the three times of the Dhamma
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion for being easy to admonish.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, etc., gives rise to unarisen condition.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_2: Not for the sake of non-existence, etc., gives rise to unarisen condition.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_3: Such things don’t give rise to repulsion, and with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_4: Such things don’t give rise to repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_5: Not seeing the causes of impingement, repetition, and shamelessness. For this is a cause of condition for the donors.
ai-patthana19.16:1.1_6: Such things don’t give rise to the repulsion of the flood, the mind, and the nice of the flood.
ai-patthana19.16:2.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existence, etc., gives rise to unarisen condition.
ai-patthana19.16:2.1_1: Not for the sake of non-existence, resentment arises dependent on the teaching, for the sake of non-existence. ...
ai-patthana19.16:3.1_0: Not for the sake of non-existent teaching ...
ai-patthana19.16:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana19.16:4.1_0: ... the thirty-two objects of the gods ...
ai-patthana19.16:5.1_0: You should get close to a question.
